TopicTitle: Capablity to choose the EVA exit

Articles.Content:
Hi.

May have been suggested before.

I would like to see a blue "Select an EXIT to EVA Jebediah Kerman" when selecting EVA for a Kerbal.

Kinda modelled on the "Transfer Crew" option.

Example the MK3 Cockpit as 3 doors. I want to choose if Jeb will come out on the probe side, sunward side or in the cargo hold.

Thanks for the read,

 

ME
Click the hatch in question and you will be given the option to EVA from there.
